title: Pixel 3 notification volume control missing?
content:
My Pixel 3's volume settings don't include a slider for "Notifications." All I have is:
Media volume
Call volume
Ring volume
Alarm volume

In doing some research online, I know for a fact that "Notification volume" exists in Android on other devices, and I feel like (anecdotally) this is a recent development on my Pixel 3. All my notifications use the same level as the "Media volume" control, which is incredibly obnoxious if I'm listening to music or a podcast in headphones or in my car. Is there really no way to control Notification volume independently from Media? Even if I set my ringer to silent or vibrate, my notifications don't respect that setting. The only way I can silence my notifications is by also silencing all my media.

Has anyone else experienced this?
